revision.text:
{{Wiktionary|ark}} {{TOC right}} '''Ark''' is a Latin-based word that means a "box" or container. '''Ark''' may refer to:
==Religion== * [[Ark (synagogue)]], a cabinet used to store a synagogue's Torah scroll * [[Ark of the Covenant]], the consecrated container for the tablets of the Ten Commandments * [[Ark of bulrushes]], the boat of the infant Moses * [[Noah's Ark]], according to Abrahamic religions, a large boat built by Noah to keep him safe, together with his family and a core breeding stock of the world’s animals * [[Blessed Virgin Mary]], called the New Ark of the Covenant by Christians of the Catholic tradition
==Film== * [[Ark (2004 film)|''Ark'' (2004 film)]], a 2004 computer-generated film directed by Kenny Hwang
==Places== * [[Ark, Virginia]], in [[Gloucester County, Virginia]] * Ark, an alternative abbreviation for [[Arkansas]] * [[The Ark (fortress)]], a fortress in Bukhara, Uzbekistan * [[The Ark (Antarctica)]], mountain{{Citation needed|date=July 2010}} * [[The London Ark]], an office block in Hammersmith, London, that looks like a ship
==People== * Joan of "Ark", occasional mis-spelling of [[Joan of Arc|Joan of ''Arc'']], a French martyr and saint who led a rebellion against an English occupation
==Technology== * [[Ark (computing)]], an archiving tool * [[Ark Linux]], a software distribution * [[Interstellar ark]], a conceptual multi-lifetime space vehicle * [[Ark (river boat)]], a temporary boat used in river transport in eastern North America * [[Ark (scooter)]]
==Agriculture== * [[Chicken ark]], a mobile shelter for domestic chickens * Pig ark, a mobile shelter for [[domestic pig]]s
==Narratives== * [[Ark (Transformers)]], a spacecraft in the fictional Transformers Universe * [[The Ark (Doctor Who)|''The Ark'' (Doctor Who)]], a series of fiction episodes * [[The Ark (Stargate Atlantis)|"The Ark" (''Stargate Atlantis'')]], an episode of ''Stargate Atlantis'' * [[Ark (Noon Universe)]], a fictional planet in a series of novels by Arkady and Boris Strugatsky * [[Ark (Baxter novel)|''Ark'' (Baxter novel)]], a hard science fiction novel. * ''[[Ark II]]'', a children's science fiction television series
==Music== * [[Ark (Brendan Perry album)]], album by Brendan Perry * [[The Ark (folk venue)]], a concert venue in Ann Arbor, Michigan * [[The Ark (band)]], Swedish glam-rock band * [[Ark (UK band)]], a melodic rock band * [[ARK (band)]], a metal band * [[Ark (L'Arc-en-Ciel album)|''Ark'' (L'Arc-en-Ciel album)]], by the Japanese rock band L'Arc-en-Ciel * [[Ark (The Animals album)|''Ark'' (The Animals album)]], a 1983 album by The Original Animals * "Ark", a song by the Japanese band [[Sound Horizon]] * "The Ark", a song by American rock band [[Dr. Dog]] * [[The Ark (album)|''The Ark'' (album)]], a bootleg album by Frank Zappa
==Video games== * ''Ark'' (game), 1996 computer game subtitled ''Search For The Future'' * Space colony ARK, in the video game ''[[Sonic Adventure 2]]'' * Ark, the main character of the video game ''[[Terranigma]]'' * [[The Ark (Halo)|The Ark (''Halo'')]], in the video game ''Halo'' * Abel's Ark, in the game ''[[Xenogears]]'' * Abel's Ark, in the series ''[[Xenosaga]]'' * The Ark, in ''[[Splinter Cell]]'' * "Ark, Ark", in the [[Lemmings (video game)|''Lemmings'' video game]] * Ark, in the computer game [[Doom (video game)|''Doom'' (video game)]] * Ark, in the video game ''[[Final Fantasy IX]]'' * ARK, in the game ''[[Anarchy Online]]'' * Ark, in the game ''[[EVE Online]]''
==Ships== * {{HMS|Ark Royal}}, a prestigious ship name in the British Royal Navy, often the name of the Fleet Flagship, has been given to five ships * [[The Ark (ship)|''The Ark'' (ship)]], a ship used in founding the Province of Maryland
==Other== * [[The Ark (newspaper)|''The Ark'' (newspaper)]], California * [[Ark (toy company)]] * Ark, a literary prize from the ''[[Arkprijs van het Vrije Woord]]'' * Biological ark or [[refugium (population biology)]]
==See also== {{Wiktionary|arc|arch-}} * [[Arc]] * [[Arch]] * [[ARK]] * [[Arkana]] * [[ARRC]]
{{Disambig}} [[cs:Archa]] [[fr:Arche]] [[ru:Ковчег]] [[fi:Arkki]] [[uk:Ковчег]]
